Package project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Note.Collections

Class CollectionSegmentView

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Note.Collections.CollectionSegmentView
public class CollectionSegmentView extends Object
A view component representing the CollectionSegment of the application.
